name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.lineTo
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D method lineTo(), part of the Canvas 2D API, adds a straight line to the current sub-path by connecting the sub-path's last point to the specified (x, y) coordinates.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.lineTo' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
